nodes.text: Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace Widescreen Video Collector's Edition

The Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace Widescreen Video Collector's Edition was a box set that included the VHS widescreen home-video release of the 1999 film Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. The set, which also included an exclusive forty-eight-page excerpt of the book The Art of Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace and an authentic 35mm film strip of The Phantom Menace, was released on April 4, 2000.
